name: 郭政淳
objective:
本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Paragraph Structure (I)
Week 3 Paragraph Structure (II)
Week 4 Writing Mechanics (Review)
Week 5 Unity and Coherence (I)
Week 6 Unity and Coherence (II)
Week 7 Transition Signals (Review)
Week 8 Writing Reviews: Summary and Reflection
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Week 10 Midterm Review
Week 11 From Paragraph to Essays 
Week 12 Comparison/Contrast Essays  
Week 13 Argumentative Essays 
Week 14 Metadiscourse
Week 15 Discussion (I): Students’ Writing Projects
Week 16 Discussion (II): Students’ Writing Projects
Week 17 Discussion (III): Students’ Writing Projects
Week 18 Final Exam
